entities.description: Documentation of whether respondents received substance abuse treatment that was imputed in various settings.
Indicates whether the respondent received substance treatment at other place as inpatient.
Indicates whether the respondent received substance treatment at outpatient substance rehabilitation treatment center.
Indicates whether the respondent received substance treatment at outpatient mental health treatment center.
Indicates whether the respondent received substance treatment at therapist's office.
Indicates whether the respondent received substance treatment at general medical office.
Indicates whether the respondent received substance treatment at hospital as outpatient.

relationships.description: Relates the imputed treatment data to whether the respondent received treatment at other inpatient facilities.
Relates the imputed treatment data to whether the respondent received treatment at outpatient substance rehabilitation centers.
Relates the imputed treatment data to whether the respondent received treatment at outpatient mental health centers.
Relates the imputed treatment data to whether the respondent received treatment at therapist offices.
Relates the imputed treatment data to whether the respondent received treatment at general medical offices.
Relates the imputed treatment data to whether the respondent received treatment at hospitals as outpatients.
